text: When the Lord your God destroys the nations whose land he is about to give you and you dispossess them and settle in their cities and houses,
you must set apart for yourselves three cities in the middle of your land that the Lord your God is giving you as a possession.

You shall build a roadway and divide into thirds the whole extent of your land that the Lord your God is providing as your inheritance; anyone who kills another person should flee to the closest of these cities.

Now <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> is the <st data-num="01697" class="">law</st> pertaining to <st data-num="07523" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="05127" class="">flees</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> in order to <st data-num="02425" class="">live</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">if</st> he has <st data-num="01097 01847">accidentally</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="07453" class="">another</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931 03808">without</st> <st data-num="08130" class="">hating</st> him <st data-num="08543 08032">at the time of the accident</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="0834" class="">Suppose</st> he <st data-num="0935" class="">goes</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="07453" class="">someone else</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="03293" class="">forest</st> to <st data-num="02404" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st> and when <st data-num="03027" class="">he</st> <st data-num="05080" class="">raises</st> the <st data-num="01631" class="">ax</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">tree</st>, the <st data-num="01270" class="">ax head</st> <st data-num="05394" class="">flies loose</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="06086" class="">handle</st> and <st data-num="04672" class="">strikes</st><n id="4" /> his <st data-num="07453" class="">fellow worker</st><n id="5" /> so hard that he <st data-num="04191" class="">dies</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">The person responsible</st><n id="6" /> may then <st data-num="05127" class="">flee</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> to <st data-num="02425" class="">save</st> himself.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="06435" class="">Otherwise</st> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> will <st data-num="07291" class="">chase</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="07523" class="">killer</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="03179" class="">heat</st> of his <st data-num="03824" class="">anger</st>, <st data-num="03588 07235 01870">eventually</st> <st data-num="05381" class="">overtake</st> him,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05221 05315">kill</st> him,<n id="2" /> though this <st data-num="0369" class="">is not</st> a <st data-num="04194" class="">capital</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">case</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">since</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08130" class="">hate</st> him <st data-num="08543 08032">at the time of the accident</st>.

<st data-num="05921 03651">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="06680 0559">commanding</st> you to <st data-num="0914" class="">set apart</st> for yourselves <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.
If the Lord your God enlarges your borders as he promised your ancestors and gives you all the land he pledged to them,

and then you are careful to observe all these commandments I am giving you today (namely, to love the Lord your God and to always walk in his ways), then you must add three more cities to these three.
You must not shed innocent blood in your land that the Lord your God is giving you as an inheritance, for that would make you guilty.

<st data-num="03588" class="">However</st>, <st data-num="01961" class="">suppose</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">person</st> <st data-num="08130" class="">hates</st> <st data-num="07453" class="">someone else</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0693" class="">stalks</st> him, <st data-num="06965 05921">attacks</st> him, <st data-num="05221 05315 04191">kills</st> him,<n id="2" /> and then <st data-num="05127" class="">flees</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="0411" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.

The <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> of his own <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> must <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> for him and <st data-num="03947" class="">remove</st> him from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">deliver</st> him <st data-num="03027" class="">over</st> to the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.
You must not pity him, but purge from Israel the guilt of shedding innocent blood, so that it may go well with you.
You must not encroach on your neighbor’s property, which will have been defined in the inheritance you will obtain in the land the Lord your God is giving you.
A single witness may not testify against another person for any trespass or sin that he commits. A matter may be legally established only on the testimony of two or three witnesses.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> a <st data-num="02555" class="">false</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05707" class="">witness</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">testifies</st> against another <st data-num="0376" class="">person</st> and <st data-num="06030" class="">accuses</st> him of a <st data-num="05627" class="">crime</st>,<n id="2" />
then both parties to the controversy must stand before the Lord, that is, before the priests and judges who will be in office in those days.

The <st data-num="08199" class="">judges</st> will <st data-num="03190" class="">thoroughly</st> <st data-num="01875" class="">investigate</st> the matter, <st data-num="02009" class="">and if</st> the <st data-num="05707" class="">witness</st> should prove to be <st data-num="05707 08267">false</st> and to have <st data-num="06030" class="">given</st> <st data-num="08267" class="">false testimony</st> against the <st data-num="0251" class="">accused</st>,<n id="1" />

you must <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> to him <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> he had <st data-num="02161" class="">intended</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> to the <st data-num="0251" class="">accused</st>. In this way you will <st data-num="01197" class="">purge</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="07130">from among</st> you.

The <st data-num="07604" class="">rest of the people</st> will <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> and <st data-num="03372" class="">become afraid</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03254 05750">keep</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">such</st> <st data-num="01697 07451">evil</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> you.
You must not show pity; the principle will be a life for a life, an eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, a hand for a hand, and a foot for a foot.
